user.title: Add Wibeee device
user.description: If using an IP address make sure the device is configured with a static IP address or DHCP assignment.

data_description.nest_upstream: Cloud service to upload data to. Default is Wibeee Nest.
data_description.throttle_sensors: Minimum interval between sensor updates. Default is 5 seconds. Set to 0 to update always.

local_push_not_received_all.title: {device_name} is not receiving updates
local_push_not_received_all.description:
{device_name} has not received an update since {last_reported}.

Configure Local Push to get updates when sensor values change.

local_push_not_received_partial.title: {device_name} is not receiving updates for all sensors
local_push_not_received_partial.description:
{device_name} has not received an update on {sensor_count} of its sensors since {last_reported}.

Configure Local Push to get updates when sensor values change.
